description: Manage saved search for log analytics workspace.

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace saved-search create
commands.summary: Create a saved search for a given workspace.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace saved-search create --category
                                                       --display-name
                                                       --name
                                                       --resource-group
                                                       --saved-query
                                                       --workspace-name
                                                       [--fa]
                                                       [--fp]
                                                       [--tags]
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace saved-search create -g MyRG --workspace-name MyWS -n MySavedSearch --category Test1 --display-name TestSavedSearch -q "AzureActivity | summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)" --fa myfun --fp "a:string = value"

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace saved-search delete
commands.summary: Delete a saved search for a given workspace.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace saved-search delete [--ids]
                                                       [--name]
                                                       [--resource-group]
                                                       [--subscription]
                                                       [--workspace-name]
                                                       [--yes]

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace saved-search list
commands.summary: List all saved searches for a given workspace.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace saved-search list --resource-group
                                                     --workspace-name

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace saved-search show
commands.summary: Show a saved search for a given workspace.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace saved-search show [--ids]
                                                     [--name]
                                                     [--resource-group]
                                                     [--subscription]
                                                     [--workspace-name]

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace saved-search update
commands.summary: Update a saved search for a given workspace.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace saved-search update --name
                                                       --resource-group
                                                       --workspace-name
                                                       [--category]
                                                       [--display-name]
                                                       [--fa]
                                                       [--fp]
                                                       [--saved-query]
                                                       [--tags]
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace saved-search update -g MyRG --workspace-name MyWS -n MySavedSearch --category Test1 --display-name TestSavedSearch -q "AzureActivity | summarize count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)" --fa myfun --fp "a:string = value"
